name: Crystalline
mutagen_message: A resonant chiming echoes within your bones.
iv_message: For a second, you feel your senses refract.

name: Crystalline
description: You've long left behind the primitive concepts of 'organic matter' and 'laws of physics'.  The constant shining is a little distracting, though.

name: Crystal Skin
description: Your skin has grown a thin layer of oddly flexible, glimmering, colorful crystal.  It stands up to most attacks that aren't blunt force, and seems to mask your scent somewhat.

name: Crystal Flesh
description: The crystallization of your skin has spread to your entire body.  The light around you shines through you, casting beautiful colored beams on nearby surfaces.  You're just about immune to everything but blunt attacks now... but shattering sure isn't fun.

name: Inner Light
description: Your crystalline form glows with a faint inner light. [NYI]

name: Jagged
description: Your shape has become sharper, all points and corners and flat planes of crystal.  Whenever an unarmed opponent strikes a part of your body that is not covered by clothing, they will receive moderate damage. [NYI]

name: Clear Thoughts
description: You find it easier to focus, through both pain and mundane distraction. [NYI]

name: Geological Metabolism
description: While the local geological formations don't look all that appealing, it's become apparent that they are -- just barely -- viable for assimilation.  Your levels of sustenance and structural integrity should benefit greatly. [NYI]
